programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22

They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Following their 3-0 win at the London Stadium in September, Tottenham are looking to complete the league double over West Ham for the first time since 2019-20. West Ham have won just one of their last eight league games against Spurs, beating them 2-1 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in December 2023.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. Arsenal have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, their longest run of league shutouts against the Tricky Trees.

programme.desc: Paris SG have conceded at least one goal in each of their last 11 matches against Lille in all competitions, with their last clean sheet coming in March 2021 in the Coupe de France. programme.title: French Super Cup 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Trophée des Champions was the 30th edition of the French super cup. It took place at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium in Kuwait City, Kuwait. The match was contested by Paris Saint-Germain, the winners of the 2024–25 Ligue 1 and Coupe de France titles, and Marseille, the runners-up of the 2024–25 Ligue 1. Paris Saint-Germain won the match 4–1 on penalties for their fourteenth Trophée des Champions title.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. Arsenal have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, their longest run of league shutouts against the Tricky Trees.

programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Wolves have won just two of their 21 Premier League games against Newcastle – only against Liverpool do they have a lower win rate among sides they’ve faced 10+ times in the competition. Newcastle have won six of their last eight Premier League games against Wolves, including each of the last four in a row. It’s as many victories as they’d managed in their previous 28 league games against them.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in all 13 of their Premier League games against Everton since their return to the division in 2019. Everton have lost each of their last four Premier League away games against Aston Villa, their longest losing run at Villa Park since between October 1995 and April 2001.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have won two of their last six LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, having secured only one victory in their previous 16 encounters against the Catalan side in the competition. Barcelona have picked up points in eight of their last nine away games against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, losing the most recent one 1-0 in November 2024. The Blaugrana have not suffered two consecutive defeats at Anoeta in the competition since a run of four between 2013 and 2016.

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Manchester City - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs. Everton - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in all 13 of their Premier League games against Everton since their return to the division in 2019. programme.title: Aston Villa vs. Everton - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in all 13 of their Premier League games against Everton since their return to the division in 2019. Everton have lost each of their last four Premier League away games against Aston Villa, their longest losing run at Villa Park since between October 1995 and April 2001.

programme.title: PSG vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 18
programme.desc: Paris SG have conceded at least one goal in each of their last 11 matches against Lille in all competitions, with their last clean sheet coming in March 2021 in the Coupe de France. Paris SG have won 10 of their last 11 home matches against Lille in all competitions, the only exception being a defeat in April 2021 in Ligue 1.

programme.title: French Super Cup 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Trophée des Champions was the 30th edition of the French super cup. It took place at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium in Kuwait City, Kuwait. The match was contested by Paris Saint-Germain, the winners of the 2024–25 Ligue 1 and Coupe de France titles, and Marseille, the runners-up of the 2024–25 Ligue 1. Paris Saint-Germain won the match 4–1 on penalties for their fourteenth Trophée des Champions title.

programme.title: Evening Show - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Every evening, following the last game of the day, the AFCON Evening Show will review the day’s action and preview the upcoming matches and talking points from Morocco. All matches from AFCON are live and exclusive only on beIN

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Bayern München vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6
programme.desc: This will be the fifth meeting between Bayern Munich and Sporting CP, all of which in the UEFA Champions League. Bayern are unbeaten in the previous four, winning three of them. The last time Bayern Munich and Sporting CP faced each other was in the Last 16 of the 2008-09 UEFA Champions League. Over two legs, the German side won 12-1 on aggregate, in what remains the biggest ever margin of victory in a UEFA Champions League knockout stage tie.

programme.title: Coventry vs Leicester - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Coventry’s Matt Grimes has created the most chances in the Championship this season, with 36 of those from set plays – 14 more than any other player. He also ranks second, behind Sorba Thomas, for passes played into the opposition penalty area. Leicester haven’t kept a clean sheet in any of their last 20 Championship matches, the longest ongoing run of any side. It’s their worst run outside of the top-flight since going 27 without a shutout between September 1948 and April 1949.

Sharjah have failed to score in each of their last two games at the AFC Champions League Elite; if they fail to score in this game, it will be their outright longest run in the competition without a goal.

programme.title: Coventry vs Leicester - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Coventry’s Matt Grimes has created the most chances in the Championship this season, with 36 of those from set plays – 14 more than any other player. He also ranks second, behind Sorba Thomas, for passes played into the opposition penalty area. Leicester haven’t kept a clean sheet in any of their last 20 Championship matches, the longest ongoing run of any side. It’s their worst run outside of the top-flight since going 27 without a shutout between September 1948 and April 1949.

programme.title: Al Wahda FC (UAE) vs Al Sadd SC (QAT) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD5
programme.desc: Each of the four previous meetings between Al Wahda and Al Sadd at the AFC Champions League Elite have ended in draws, with three of them being goalless draws; however, Al Wahda have a five-game winning streak in the competition against sides from Qatar, while Al Sadd are unbeaten in their last 17 games against sides from UAE. Al Sadd have lost each of their last two games in AFC Champions League Elite, conceding multiple goals in each of them; they have never lost three games on the bounce in competition history.

programme.title: Al Hilal SFC (KSA) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD5
programme.desc: Al-Hilal have won each of their three meetings with Al Shorta at AFC Champions League Elite, keeping clean sheets in each of the last two; Al Shorta have won just one of their 10 meetings against sides from Saudi Arabia – a 2-1 win against Al-Ahli on 17 September 2020. Al Shorta have lost each of their last three games at the AFC Champions League Elite, last going on a longer such run in April 2021 ; in fact, they are yet to register an away win in the competition.

programme.title: SINNER, Jannik (ITA) vs. SHELTON, Ben (USA) - Men's Semi Final 1- Day 13 -Australian Open 2025 Mini
programme.desc: Extended Highlights of key matches form the Australian Open 2025 - The 113th edition of the Australian Open, kicking off the Grand Slam season in 2025, brings the world's best tennis players to Melbourne Park's iconic hard courts. Known for its electric atmosphere, the tournament promises thrilling matchups as top-ranked athletes and emerging talents compete for the prestigious title. Showcasing a perfect blend of tradition, innovation, and sportsmanship, the Australian Open 2025 sets the tone for an exciting year in tennis.

programme.title: Mallorca vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Club Deportivo Mallorca have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Athletic Club and, should they fail to win this match, they will equal their longest ever winless run against the Basque team in the competition, which was between 1969 and 1988. Athletic Club have drawn eight of their 18 away games against Mallorca in LaLiga in the 21st century. They have only recorded more away draws against Getafe in the competition since then.

programme.title: BOLELLI, Simone (ITA) / VAVASSORI, Andrea (ITA) vs. HELIOVAARA, Harri (FIN) / PATTEN, Henry (GBR) -
programme.desc: Extended Highlights of key matches form the Australian Open 2025 - The 113th edition of the Australian Open, kicking off the Grand Slam season in 2025, brings the world's best tennis players to Melbourne Park's iconic hard courts. Known for its electric atmosphere, the tournament promises thrilling matchups as top-ranked athletes and emerging talents compete for the prestigious title. Showcasing a perfect blend of tradition, innovation, and sportsmanship, the Australian Open 2025 sets the tone for an exciting year in tennis.

programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.
